arts.ttl: Fans fume at 'the most Tottenham set-piece imaginable' after James Maddison and Son Heung-min are caught in hilarious blunder
arts.sum: The north Londoners were beaten in the first leg of their Last 16 tie by the Dutch side, courtesy of a hugely unlucky Lucas Bergvall own goal in the first half, in the latest blow to Tottenham Hotspur.

arts.ttl: Ange Postecoglou admits Tottenham were 'NOWHERE NEAR' their level in dismal Europa League first leg defeat at AZ Alkmaar
arts.sum: A comical own goal by Lucas Bergvall in the 18th minute proved enough for AZ to register a first victory over an English club in 12 attempts.

arts.ttl: Ange Postecoglou provides Dominic Solanke injury update as Tottenham suffer new suspension blow
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur head coach Ange Postecoglou delivers an update on Dominic Solanke following his enforced withdrawal in their 1-0 Europa League loss to AZ Alkmaar.

arts.ttl: 'Up there with the best': Les Ferdinand claims Tottenham's £17m man proved why he's so important vs AZ Alkmaar
arts.sum: Les Ferdinand was left particularly impressed by one Tottenham Hotspur player against AZ Alkmaar on an otherwise disappointing night for the North Londoners. Tottenham Hotspur return...

arts.ttl: Ange Postecoglou handed Tottenham suspension blow for AZ Alkmaar last-16 second leg
arts.sum: Despite being dominated for much of the game, Tottenham have every chance of still qualifying for the quarter-finals with only one goal in it. Spurs were far from their best in the Netherlands with Lucas Bergvall's own goal in the opening half an hour seeing AZ lead the tie.

arts.ttl: Tottenham goalkeeper Guglielmo Vicario riles fans with full-time gesture for more support after dismal defeat at AZ Alkmaar as struggling stars are told to 'concentrate on their own performances'
arts.sum: Vicario was seen demonstratively raising his arms towards the away fans following Tottenham's 1-0 defeat to AZ Alkmaar, with the Italian appearing to be calling for more support.

arts.ttl: Son Heung-Min slams Spurs for 'disappointing' 1-0 defeat by AZ Alkmaar as captain warns loss is a 'big wake-up call' ahead of second leg
arts.sum: Heung-min Son has branded Tottenham 's feeble display and defeat at AZ Alkmaar as a 'big, big wake-up call' as they strive to salvage something from a miserable season.

arts.ttl: Tottenham performance ‘nowhere near’ required standard – Ange Postecoglou
arts.sum: Lucas Bergvall’s own goal earned AZ Alkmaar a narrow victory.

arts.ttl: Ange Postecoglou shares Dominic Solanke injury update after Tottenham forward came off against AZ tonight
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur endured a bad day at the office as they fell to a 1-0 defeat to AZ in their Europa League last-16 first leg...

arts.ttl: Latest transfer news: Chelsea eye Barcelona duo as Spurs lead Grealish race
arts.sum: The January transfer window is now little more than a distant memory in European football and as such clubs across the continent are already making plans for the summer window. Teams are working...
